mapper.insert: insert into issue(pid, uid, response, issuetype, issuestate,issuetitle ,issuecontent ,prework,priority, makeDay,startDay ,endDay ,changeDay ) values (#{pid},#{uid},#{response},#{issuetype},#{issuestate},#{issuetitle},#{issuecontent},#{prework},#{priority}, #{makeDay}, #{startDay},#{endDay},#{changeDay})
mapper.update: update issue set pid=#{pid},uid=#{uid},response=#{response},issuetype=#{issuetype},issuestate=#{issuestate},issuetitle=#{issuetitle}, issuecontent=#{issuecontent},prework=#{prework},priority=#{priority},startDay=#{startDay}, endDay=#{endDay},changeDay=now() where issueid=#{issueid}
